title: Ep. 387 - Mueller Collapses On Capitol Hill
description:
Democrats’ hopes were dashed as Mueller disintegrated during congressional testimony. We examine what he did and didn't say. Then, a new poll shows Americans are concerned about one issue above all others. Finally, Colorado State publishes an Orwellian campus language guide. Date: 07-24-2019
